title: Teach the Teacher Program for Chronic Respiratory Disease Rehabilitation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: In large-scale online real-time education settings, the "Teach the Teacher" model is applied to strengthen rehabilitation education competencies. Conducted in digital device-provided environments with formative assessment-centered monitoring

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles and clinical applications of chronic respiratory disease rehabilitation
Learners can design educational materials for peer educators using the Teach the Teacher (TtT) model
Learners can implement effective rehabilitation education strategies for large-scale learners using online tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
